driver:
@@DRVNAME@@ http://gimp-print.sourceforge.net/ gs -q -dPARANOIDSAFER -dNOPAUSE -dBATCH -dNOINTERPOLATE -sDEVICE=ijs -sIjsServer=ijsgutenprint.@@STPREL@@ -dIjsUseOutputFD%A -sIjsParams="@@REMAP@@STP_VERSION=@@STPVER@@,%B"%Z -sOutputFile=- - This page provides data for the IJS driver of Gutenprint 5.0. If you are using a Gimp-Print 4.2 release (e. g. 4.2.7), driver of the Gimp-Print 4.2.x series, please visit the "gimp-print-ijs" page, and if you are using Gimp-Print 4.0.x, go to the "stp" page.

Gutenprint supports a wide variety of Epson Stylus, HP DeskJet, LaserJet, Canon BubbleJet, Lexmark inkjet printers, with the primary goal being uncompromising quality. Epson Stylus printers in particular are supported in all resolutions and modes, and many models are capable of producing prints that rival photographic prints in quality. This package also offers much faster printing for high quality text and presentation graphics when required.

The execution information currently here corresponds to driver version @@STPVER@@. If you use another version, use the Foomatic data which comes with the Gutenprint package.

Note that the Foomatic datafiles provided here are only for the IJS driver of Gutenprint. For the native CUPS driver there are special PPD files provided by the Gutenprint package.

This driver is built as an IJS driver, which does not require recompiling Ghostscript. It requires an IJS enabled GhostScript (GNU GhostScript 6.53 or newer, APFL GhostScript 7.04 or newer).

@@STPRINTERS@@
